attributes.action: Recognise the Socialist Federal Union of Ponderosa Hills as a sovereign state
attributes.additional_details: The Socialist Federal Union of Ponderosa Hills is a de facto nation that is currently in the midst of a people's struggle against American and Canadian occupation of its territory, that it rightfully claims under the self-determination provisions of Article 1 of the United Nations Charter. If the UK grants recognition to Ponderosa Hills as a sovereign state, their great battle for liberation may lead to victory! Thank you, and with your signature, may the Ponderosan cause be victorious!
attributes.background: I am petitioning the Parliament and Foreign Secretary to formally recognise the Socialist Federal Union of Ponderosa Hills, a de facto nation surrounded by the United States of America and the Dominion of Canada, as an independent and sovereign state.

rejection.details: We understand you want Ponderosa Hills to be recognised as a sovereign state, however we can find no verifiable evidence of this region having a government that has sought international recognition.
